text: Still Alice is a drama movie from 2014 based on the novel of the same name. It is about a linguistics professor diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease. Julianne Moore plays Alice. Kristen Stewart plays Lydia. Kate Bosworth plays Anna. Alec Baldwin plays John. Still Alice was released on December 5, 2014 in the United States. Julianne Moore won an Academy Award for Best Actress. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:2014 drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:American drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American independent movies
title: Still Alice
